A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie ever made. It is riddled with plot holes\, in a piece meal fashion\, with complete disregard to every Star Wars movie that came before it. It was far too long of a movie to leave so many details out. The lack of character development\, overuse of schoolyard humor\, and blatant disrespect to the franchise cannot be overlooked.
